display_long_description:
Dive into a **relaxing, color-filled escape** with Color A Cube. This **immersive** coloring experience lets you bring voxel worlds to life, one cube at a time. **Discover unique themes and models**, with new content inspired by our community!


[media]
Download now and start coloring **18 unique models at no cost**, with free monthly content updates!
If you enjoy the experience, check out the other packs available for purchase, each one is filled with fun, original models for you to paint!


[media]
Grab your brush and dive into the soothing world of voxel art. In Color a Cube, every tap of color reveals more than just a painted block, it uncovers tiny details, charming surprises, and the hidden soul of each handcrafted model.
[media]


[media]
With the Meta Quest 3 lineup, you can choose to play in either Mixed Reality (MR) or Virtual Reality (VR). Paint your models your way, whether you're sitting or standing, the experience is tailored to your comfort and creativity! 

[media]
- A steady stream of new content
- Difficulty levels
- New modes
- Diorama's to showcase your creations
- Extended shop
- More to be revealed!

[media]
We’re launching in early access to involve our community in shaping the game. Your feedback will help us refine features, add content, and create the best experience possible! Join our Discord server to share your ideas, report bugs, and participate
